name: css-animation-delay
description: Css module of single purpose classes for animation delay

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-animation-delay.css > css/css-animation-delay.css && tachyons src/css-animation-delay.css --minify > css/css-animation-delay.min.css && tachyons src/css-animation-delay.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
